official_title: Examining the Generality of Laboratory-based Findings and Their Moderators Using Diverse Samples From the International Tobacco Control (ITC) Policy Evaluation Project Cohorts - Study 3a
inclusion_criteria:
* From CA, US, or EN
* At least 21 years old
* Smoking daily
* Smoking mostly or about equal amounts of factory-made cigarettes
* Does not currently vape (for exclusive smokers only)
* Vapes Daily (for dual users only)
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 21 Years
exclusion_criteria: * There will be no additional exclusion criteria for this study.
